title: How long until I can post in team recruitment? Reached lvl 5 but it says im lvl 4 on my profile.
body: It says "Level 5 or higher required". This is a smurf and it's been lvl 5 around a day. Does it take a while to update? I can still post in gameplay and support, just not in Team Recruitment and I think other boards.

replies.body: Heyo Venus Project! I just wanted to check back in and see if you were still having problems. Keep me updated!

Hey there,

Sometimes the boards take a while to update, if you're still not good after another day or so try [sending a ticket over to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), they should be able to help out :).
